channel.title: EFoL 4&3/4 - Game Thread - Day 5 (5/16) - The Blue Dragon and Scorned are victorious!
channel.description:
![Throne of Lies Banner|900x275](https://i.imgur.com/cdLeUII.png)
### Welcome to EFoL 4<sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>4</sub> - hosted by @Datbird @Chloe @Katze and @Arete
### Reviewed by FOL Balance Team
## Rules
Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. Wisdom of the Mod will be used heavily for this game in order to ensure a quality game experience. Alts are *not* allowed.
## Gameplay
* Days are 48 hours long or until an execution ends it, Nights last 24 hours. The first day is an exception, it lasts only 24 hours and has no execution. * You will be provided a DM with your classcard by the host, send your actions there. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * All other private messages will take place through the forum. * Flavor, if it exists, is not alignment-indicative.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/vote [player]”. Please make the life of the hosts easier by bolding it, and pinging an active host: `**/vote [player] @host**` and `**/unvote @host**` * Should the votes reach majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * Voting “no execute” is an option. * You may self vote.
## Picking a New King
* At the start of d2 and every day phase after a king dies, a king election takes place. There will not be an election if there are 4 or less players alive. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote *in their class PM* for who they want to become the next king. * Voting for execution may take place simultaneously. If a majority execution takes place before the end of the 12 hour period, the election instantly resolves. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
Ask the hosts if you have any questions. The [feedback list](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-list/75082) works for most results.
Night abilities will be processed in following order/priority:
1. Visit Prevention 2. Occupation 4. Bus Driving (target swapping) 5. Killing 6. Protection 7. Miscellaneous Effects (like Bounty) 8. Investigation 1 (Faction checks, type checks, etc) 9. Conversion 10. Investigation 2 (Every kind of investigation which checks for abilities used *this* night)
In case there are conflicts on the same level (example: two drunks bus drive the same people), all these conflicting effects are canceled.
(thanks Geyde)
## Journals
DM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. It has a limit of 1000 characters.
## Classlist
[details="Blue Dragon"]
> # [color=steblue]The Prince :crossed_swords: :shield:[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] > > **High Profile (Passive)** - When the Mastermind or Cult Leader attempt to convert you, they will instead attempt to attack you. > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > > **Tools of the State (Night)** - Perform your chosen night action on a player. Cannot choose the same one until all others are cycled through. > > **Behead** - Kill a player. :crown: > > **Imprison** - Occupy a player, bypassing immunities. Prevent anyone else from visiting them. > > **Allies** - Determine the faction of the targeted player. > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Archer :shield:[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] > **Honorbound (Passive)** - Cannot spawn alongside any other non-Prince unique classes. > > **Bullseye (Night)** - Place a mark on the targeted player. They will lose any passive death immunity. Targeting yourself will remove all marks. Marks disappear on death or class change. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Eagle Shot (Night)** - Kill a marked player, or remove all marks and kill all marked players. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Butler[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] > **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. > > **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. Cannot target the same player on consecutive nights. - Infinite Uses > **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Occupy all players who visit you tonight. Bypasses occupation immunity. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Chronomancer[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] > > **Pocket Dimension (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for two nights. - 1 Use > > **Time Warp (Night)** - Delay the target player's death for two nights. Operates as a heal for the purposes of relevant interactions. You will be informed the following night if you successfully delayed a death. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Intervention (Night)** - Redirect deaths delayed by Time Warp to the targeted player. Redirected deaths count as a normal attack. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > > **Bongcloud Attack (Day)** - The target of tonight's inspect will be inspected the following night as well. - 1 Use > > **Inspect (Night)** - Determine if a player is a member of the Unseen or Cult. Only usable on odd nights. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] > > **Clear Mind (Day)** - Empower Ley Lines to make a player immune to conversion this night. - 2 Uses > **Icy Veins (Day)** - Empower Ley Lines to make a player immune to death this night. - 2 Uses > > **Ley Lines (Night)** - Make a player immune to occupation and redirection this night. Cannot target the same player on consecutive nights. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Liquorlust (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. > > **Debauchery (Night)** - Target 2 other players. Redirect all players targeting either of your targets to the other. You will be seen visiting your first target only. This cannot target the same player twice in a row. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Hunter[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] > **Wolf Companion (Day)** - Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in two nights if not healed. Cannot be used the day after using Bear Companion. - 1 Use, starting d2 > > **Bear Companion (Night)** - You will become immune to death this night. All players that attacked you will die the following night unless healed. Cannot be used the night after using Wolf Companion. - 2 Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Major :shield:[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Oath to the Cause (Passive)** - If the Prince dies, you will become the Prince. Cannot spawn alongside other non-Prince unique classes. > > **Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. Only usable if a member of the Blue Dragon was executed the previous day, and can only target players who voted to execute them. - 2 Uses, starting n2 :crown: > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Observer[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > > **Follow (Night)** - Determine who your target visits tonight. - Infinite Uses > **Stakeout (Night)** - Determine who visits your target tonight. You cannot be protected when using this ability. - 2 Uses, starting n2 > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Physician[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] > > **Exhume (Day)** - At the end of the night, determine if the target dead player was killed by a member of the Unseen or Cult. - 2 Uses > > **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying this night. They will also be cured of any bleeding they may be suffering from. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Self-Care (Night)** - Heal yourself. Cannot be used if you used Exhume yesterday. - 2 Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Princess[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > > **Flirt (Night)** - Determine a player's class type. Special will show as Investigative. - 3 Uses > **Matchmake (Night)** - Determine if the target player can win with the last player you targeted. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > > **Gossip (Night)** - Determine if the chosen thing happened to your target. Will receive results only if the action chosen was successful. - Infinite Uses > - Protected > - Investigated > - Occupied > - Converted > > **Bounty (Night)** - Guess who gets executed tomorrow. If successful, you will get one of the corresponding benefits depending on their class type. - Infinite Uses > - Special (Night) - Disable scumchat the following day / night - 1 Use > - Social (Night) - If the target player is executed tomorrow and is a member of the Blue Dragon, there will be a second execution - 1 Use > - Investigative - Gossip will receive all effects for the following night > - Offensive - All non-killing abilities will fail on you for the following night / day > - Support - Gain permanent immunity to bleeding > - Killer (Night) - Kill a player - 1 Use > - Neutral Evil (Night) - Determine a player's alignment - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Mystic[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] > > **Dream Shield (Night)** - Give a player death immunity tonight. If you die, they will die as well. Cannot target the same player on consecutive nights. - Infinite Uses > **Mind Meld (Night)** - If the target player is attacked, you will die in their place instead. If you die in any way when using this ability, you will create a permanent chat with your target and not be added to dead chat as long as they live. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Squire[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] > > **Take up the Mantle (Night)** - Become a non-unique BD class at the end of the night. If it has royal blood, you will not have it. May only choose classes of currently dead Blue Dragon players. - Infinite Uses > **Try to be Helpful (Night)** - Target a player. You will learn if they visited or were visited by another player. - 2 Uses > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> # [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] > **Resolute (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. > > **Vigilanteism (Night)** - Target a player. Increase your suspicion of them by 1 and the corresponding effect will take place. - Infinite Uses >> - [1] Interfere - Remove a player's immunities for this night. >> - [2] Stand Guard - Occupy a player and protect them. If they would die tonight, you will die in their place. >> - [3] Cold Steel - Kill a player if you've targeted them three times. Otherwise, prevent all visits to them and occupy them if they attempt to kill a player. > > **Duel (Night)** - Repeat the last effect achieved through Vigilanteism on a player of your choice, regardless of your current suspicion of them. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
[/details]
[details="Unseen"]
> # [color=purple]The Mastermind :shield: :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Special**[/color] > > **New World Order (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to death at night once. > - You appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities. > - If you survive until n4, you will gain a use of Convert. > - Immune to occupation on the first night. You are informed if you are occupied or redirected. > - If any member of the Unseen becomes King, they will retain their original class's abilities alongside their new ones. > - If you target the Neutral Evil with your night abilities, they will be added to the scum chat. > - If you die before converting successfully once, then the next oldest member of the Unseen will become the new Mastermind. > > **Command (Day)** - Guarantee that a member of the Unseen succeeds in any non-killing or non-conversion actions they take tonight. Can self target, but cannot target the same player twice in a row. - Infinite Uses > **Go for the Throat (Day)** - Make a player believe that they are bleeding. - 2 Uses > > **Convert (Night)** - Change a player into the Unseen version of their class. Refunds a use if the conversion failed. - 1 Use > **Dirty Work (Night)** - Target a player with one of the following effects - Infinite Uses > - **Intercept** - Occupy a player. > - **Stalk** - Determine who visits the target player. You will also learn if they can be converted. > - **Hired Goons** - Make a player immune to death tonight. > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
one of assassin / baron
> # [color=purple]The Assassin :shield: :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] > **The Perfect Crime (Passive)** - While you are alive, you must perform the factional kill. Every night, you can choose to empower the factional kill with one of the following effects. > - Bypasses healing (can't be chosen more than twice, only on even nights) > - Bypasses death immunity (can't be chosen more than once) > - You will not be seen visiting your target > - Their flip will be cleaned (can't be chosen more than once) > - Occupies the target. Additionally, if they survive, they will be unable to use any abilities for the rest of the game (unless they are neutral/unseen). Effect removed on conversion to the Unseen. > > **Lacerate (Day)** Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in two nights if not healed. - 1 Use > > **Opportunism (Night)** - Kill a player. If anyone visits your target, they will learn that you are the Assassin. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Baron :shield: :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. If you become king, you will gain a secret additional vote that you can use at any time. > **Press Bias (Passive)** - You will appear as a class type of your choice to investigative abilities. > > **Contacts (Day)** - Send a player a message of up to 1000 characters. They may reply once. - Infinite Uses > > **Planned Accident (Night)** - Guess a class and a target. You will kill them if they are a class with Royal Blood and you guessed correctly. If they do not have royal blood and you guessed correctly, they will occupied this night and the next night. If you guess incorrectly, this ability is disabled. - 2 Uses > **Coverup (Night)** - Change the flip of the target player if they die tonight. - 2 Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Arbalist :shield:[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] > **Aim to Kill (Passive)** - If the factional kill fails to kill its target, they will be marked. > > **Bullseye (Night)** - Place a mark on the targeted player. They will lose any passive death immunity. Targeting yourself will remove all marks. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Raven Shot (Night)** - Kill a marked player, or remove all marks and kill all marked players. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Servant[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] > **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. > > **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. - Infinite Uses > **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Occupy all players who visit you tonight. Bypasses occupation immunity. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Timesnatcher[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] > **5th Dimension (Passive)** - When using Alternate Timeline, if your target would be protected by another source, disable the protection of both Alternate Timeline and the other source(s). Cannot disable the curing of bleeds. > > **Time Skip (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for two nights. - 2 Uses > > **Alternate Timeline (Night)** - Delay the target player’s death for two nights. Operates as a heal for the purposes of relevant interactions. You will be informed the following night if you successfully delayed a death. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Close Loops (Night)** - Redirect deaths delayed by Alternate Timeline to the targeted player. Redirected deaths count as a normal attack. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Templar[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > **Authority (Passive)** - Upon being converted, you will learn the class types of every player you checked previously. You will not be seen visiting your targets except on odd nights. > > **Test Reaction (Day)** - Determine if a player is a member of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite Uses > > **Probe (Night)** - Determine a player's class if they are a member of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Arcanist[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] > > **True Sight (Day)** - For this night only, empower your night ability to grant occupation and redirection immunity for the night. - 2 Uses > **Shock (Day)** - For this night only, empower your night ability to cause the target to believe they were redirected if they would receive non-standard feedback. - 2 Uses > > **Apex Focus (Night)** - Target a player. On the following night, they will be unable to be visited by anyone who is not a member of the Unseen. - Infinite Uses, 1 night cooldown :crown: > **Mire (Night)** - Make a player appear as a chosen class type to investigative abilities this night. - 2 Uses :crown:
> # [color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Liquorlust (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You cannot perform the factional kill in the same night as performing Debauchery unless you are the last member of the Unseen alive. > > **Debauchery (Night)** - Target 2 other players. Redirect all players targeting either of your targets to the other. You will be seen visiting your first target only. This cannot target the same player twice in a row. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Poacher[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] > **Rabid Wolves (Day)** - Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in two nights if not healed. - 1 Use > > **Pack Tactics (Night)** - If the performer of the factional kill fails to visit their target, you will kill their target for them. - Infinite Uses > **Bear Trap (Night)** - Target a player. The following night, anybody who visits them will be occupied that night and the next. - 2 Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The General :shield:[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Remove Opposition (Passive)** - When the Prince dies, you will be able to use Decree. > > **Martyrship (Day)** - Kill yourself and a player of your choice. Cannot be used in the last 6 hours of the day. - 1 Use :crown: > > **Decree (Night)** - Perform your chosen night action on a player. Cannot choose the same one until all others are cycled through. - Infinite Uses > > **Behead** - Kill a player. > > **Imprison** - Occupy a player, bypassing immunities. Prevent anyone else from visiting them. > > **Allies** - Determine the target player's class. > > **Imperial Order** - Frame the target player. > > **Secret Service** - The king's night action will fail tonight. > > **Blood Test (Night)** - Determine if a player has royal blood. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > > **Flock of Crows (Day)** - At the end of the night, you will know if anyone visits the target player or if they visited another player. You will know which. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > **Follow (Night)** - Determine who a player visits and who they are visited by. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Herbalist[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] > > **Drug (Day)** - Make a player believe they are bleeding. - 1 Use :crown: > **Hemophilia (Day)** - Make a player unable to be healed for the rest of the game. - 1 Use > > **Placebo (Night)** - Choose to either make your target appear to visit a chosen player instead of their original target, or to make them appear to be visited by a chosen player(s). - Infinite Uses > **Operation (Night)** - Heal a player. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Duchess[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > > **Bat Eyelashes (Night)** - Determine a player's class type and faction. - Infinite Uses > **Dark Wisp (Night)** - Make all members of the Unseen appear as members of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities tonight. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > > **Gossip (Night)** - Learn every ability that targeted your target and if it was successful or not. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > **Bounty (Night)** - Guess who gets executed tomorrow. If successful, you will get one of the corresponding benefits depending on their class type. > - Special - You will become The Mastermind at the start of the night. New World Order will give a use of Convert on n5 instead of n4. - 1 Use > - Social (Night) - If the target player is executed tomorrow and is a member of the Blue Dragon, there will be a second execution - 1 Use > - Investigative - The Factional kill will be unable to be seen by any investigatives tonight. > - Offensive - All non-killing abilities will fail on you for the following night / day > - Support - Gain permanent immunity to bleeding > - Killer (Night) - Kill a player - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Illusionist[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] > **No Escape from Reality (Passive)** - You will flip as The Mystic when using Mind Meld. Upon the death of your target when using Mind Meld, your true class will be revealed. > > **Dream Shield (Night)** - Give a player death immunity tonight. If you die, they will die as well. Cannot target the same player on consecutive nights. - Infinite Uses > **Mind Meld (Night)** - If the target player is attacked, you will die in their place instead. If you die in any way when using this ability, you will create a permanent chat with your target and not be added to dead chat as long as they live. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Page[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] > **Sharp Wit (Passive)** - You are death immune once. You appear to be a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities. This passive is removed when either changing classes or after night 3 ends. > > **Take up the Mantle (Night)** - Name a non-unique Blue Dragon class. You will become the Unseen version of it. - Infinite Uses > **Sharpen Blade (Night)** - Learn if the target player was visited or visited anybody last night. Will receive results for each if applicable. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=purple]The Enforcer[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] > **Resolute (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. > > **Challenge (Night)** - Redirect a player to yourself. If they attempt to kill you, you will kill them instead. - Infinite Uses > **Kick in the Ribs (Night)** - Make a player unable to act the following two nights. - 1 Use > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
[/details]
[details="Cult"]
> # [color=darkred]The Cult Leader :shield: :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Special**[/color] > **Charisma (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - If any member of the Cult becomes king, they will retain their original class's abilities alongside their new ones. > - If you target the Neutral Evil with your night abilities, they will be added to the scum chat. > - The factional kill may not be performed alongside conversion unless there is only one member of the cult alive. > - If the Cult Leader dies, their role transfers to the next oldest member of the cult. > > **Hand of Mithras (Day)** - Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in two nights if not healed. - 1 Use > > **Brainwash (Night)** - Change a player into their respective Cult class. Goes on cooldown if successful. - Infinite Uses, 1 night cooldown > **Ancient Proverbs (Night)** - Retrain a member of the Cult into a different Cult class (other than Cult Leader). Neither you or they will be able to perform other actions tonight. If this is used on a player who is not a member of the Cult, you will learn if they would be able to be converted this night. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=darkred]The Acolyte :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Killer**[/color] > **Mithras's Strength (Passive)** - If there are 2 members of the Cult alive and you perform the factional kill, it will bypass healing and death immunity. > **Bound by Fate (Passive)** - If you were converted from the Major or the Archer, you will be able to use **Sacrificial Dagger**. > > **Sacrificial Dagger (Night)** - Kill a player. - 1 use > > **Horrid Chant (Day)** - Make a player believe they are bleeding. - 2 Uses > > **Flesh Wall (Night)** - A player of your choice will become immune to death this night. Any player that attacks them will die the following night unless healed. Can self target. - 2 Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=darkred]The Invoker :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Offensive**[/color] > **Mithras's Madness (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, all players targeting the player that you chose will be occupied bypassing immunities the following night. > > **Numbing Chant (Day)** - If the target player uses or has used day abilities today, cancel them and occupy them this day. - 1 Use :crown: > > **Divine Intervention (Night)** - If a member of the Blue Dragon was executed the previous day, occupy a player. If a member of the Cult or a Neutral was executed the previous day, target two other players. Redirect all players targeting either of your targets to the other. You will be seen visiting your first target only. Neither effect can target the same player twice in a row. - 3 Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=darkred]The Seeker :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Investigative**[/color] > **Mithras's Insight (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will learn the classes of every player who visited your target. > **Mind over Matter (Passive)** - You will learn the identity of every player who visits you at the end of the night. > > **Ouija Board (Night)** - Determine a player's class type and faction. - 2 Uses > **Banish (Night)** - Guess a player's class. If correct, they will appear as [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] to investigative abilities for the rest of the game. You will know if you are correct or not. A correctly guessed Neutral Evil will be added to the scum chat as well. - Infinite Uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=darkred]The Ritualist :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Support**[/color] > **Corax's Influence (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will be death immune that night. > > **Pure Darkness (Night)** - Make a member of the Cult appear to be a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities. They will be cured of any bleeding they may be suffering from. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Piercing Gaze (Night)** - Make a player unable to be visited by any member of the Blue Dragon the following night. They will be informed of this. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> # [color=darkred]The Apostle :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Social**[/color] > **Anstreim's Anguish (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you may choose to either: disable all private chats permanently until you die, make every player think they were redirected, or for the target of the factional kill to have their flip cleaned. > > **Miracle (Day)** - Swap classes with the Cult Leader at the start of the night provided both of you are still alive and that neither of you are king. - 1 Use (shared) > > **Powers that Be (Night)** - Learn every ability that targeted your target and if it was successful or not. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
[/details]
[details="Neutral Evil"]
> # [color=brown]The Sellsword :shield: :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color=brown]**Neutral Evil**[/color] **Among Friends (Passive)** - You are aligned against the Blue Dragon. After the second night or whenever you are added to the scum chat, you will appear as a member of the Unseen or Cult to investigative abilities. **Contracted (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: >* Immune to occupation and redirection. >* Immune to attacks from the Unseen or Cult. >* If all members of the Unseen or Cult die and you have not been added to their scum chat, you will gain a factional kill and prevent the game from ending as long as you are alive. > * Your class type is Offensive for the purpose of all interactions. > * Before the end of day 1, you must choose the effect of **Intimidate** to match one of the following or it will be randomized. > * The Drunk's **Debauchery** > * The Butler's **Serve Wine** > * The Knight's **Vigilanteism** > > - You cannot target the same player on consecutive nights with your night abilities. > >**Stonewall (Night)** - Prevent non-attack and non-conversion abilities from targeting your target. Can't be used after the second night. - 2 uses :crown: >**Intimidate (Night)** - Use your chosen night ability. - Infinite uses > >*Defeat the Blue Dragon at any cost.*
> # [color=hotpink]The Fool :shield: :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color=hotpink]**Neutral Evil**[/color] > **Insanity (Passive)** - You are aligned with the [Unseen/Cult], and appear as a member of the Unseen or Cult to investigative abilities. If you are ever added to their scum chat, Mask of Many Faces will be disabled and your win condition will change to '*Defeat the Blue Dragon.*' > **Final Prank (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > * Immune to attacks from the Unseen or Cult on the first and second night. > * You cannot be protected from any attacks by members of the Blue Dragon. > * Your class type is Social for the purpose of all interactions. > * If a member of the Blue Dragon is executed, you will be able to use your night abilities twice the following night. > * All players who you visit will appear to be the Fool to investigative abilities for this night and the next night. > > **Mask of Many Faces (Day)** - If you are executed, all players who voted you will be unable to be protected the following night. The Unseen or Cult will be informed that you were executed. You will also flip as a class of your choice. - 2 Uses > > **Eavesdrop (Night)** - Learn the target player's alignment. You will also determine who they appear to visit to investigative abilities. - Infinite Uses > **Juggle (Night)** - Make all abilities targeting the chosen player fail tonight. Cannot target the same player(s) on consecutive nights. - Infinite Uses :crown: > > *Make sure no more than 1 member of the Unseen or Cult is executed during the game at any cost.*
> # [color=tomato]The Chancellor :shield: :crossed_swords:[/color] > [color=tomato]**Neutral Evil**[/color] > **Determination (Passive)** - You are aligned with the [Unseen/Cult]. If you are ever added to their scum chat, you will appear as a member of the Unseen or Cult to investigative abilities and Wilting Flower will be able to kill the target once. > **Megalomaniac (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > * Immune to attacks from the Unseen or Cult. > * You will appear to be a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities on the first and second night. > * Your class type is Support for the purposes of all interactions. This changes to Killer if you are added to the scum chat. > * You will know how many Neutrals are in the game at the start. > * On even nights, you will be informed of the identity of a member of the Unseen or Cult. > > **Wilting Flower (Night)** - Remove a player's immunities. If they are not aligned with the Blue Dragon, they will appear as a class of your choice to investigative abilities. - Infinite Uses :crown: > **Staged Fall (Night)** - Target a player. If they are executed tomorrow and are a member of the Blue Dragon, you will receive all of the following benefits. - Infinite Uses :crown: > - Gain permanent immunity to bleeding, alongside curing any bleeding you currently may be suffering from. > - You will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities for the next two nights. > - The King, if they are aligned with the Blue Dragon, will have their abilities fail the following night. > - Your next use of Wilting Flower will additionally frame the target and allow you to choose who they appear to visit. > > *Make sure at least 3 members of the Blue Dragon executed or survive to see the Blue Dragon lose.*
[/details]
[details="Neutrals"]
># [color=#86a94a]The Mercenary[/color] :fire: >[color=#86a94a]**Neutral Support**[/color] >**Failure (Passive)** - If your targets both die, you will commit suicide. > >**Savior (Day)** - If one of your targets is voted for execution today, take their place. - 1 use > >**Stand Guard (Night)** - Prevent non-conversion abilities from targeting one of your targets. In addition, you are death immune this night. The death immunity provided by this ability will only work once. - 4 uses :crown: [if target is king] > >_Your objective is to ensure that at least one of your targets remains alive until the end of the game. Your targets are [x] and [y]._
> The Mercenary's targets will always be convertible Blue Dragon classes, Neutral Evil, or starting Cult/Unseen.
> # [color = "Firebrick"] The Strigoi [/color] :fire: :shield: > **[color = "gray"] Neutral Offensive [/color]** >**Blood Sucker (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You are always under the effects of Vampirism, and are immune to death on the first night. If you are executed during the day, then the Prince, if they are alive, will be immune to death the following night. **Vampirism (Passive)** - You appear as a Neutral Killer to investigative abilities. You will not appear to visit anyone during the night. > >**Blood Frenzy (Day)** - All players under the effect of Vampirism will be death immune for this night. - 1 use > >**Vampiric Bite (Night)** - Bite a player, infecting them with Vampirism, preventing healing on them for this night, and occupying them. - Infinite uses :crown: > >*Make sure at least half of the living remainder of the Court is infected with Vampirism by the end of the game.*
> # [color=red]The Scorned[/color] :fire: > [color=red]**Neutral Social**[/color] > **Utter Contempt (Passive)** - Immune to occupation, redirection, and visit prevention. You are immune to death from non-BD attacks once. Targeting a player with a night ability will mark them for the following day. After achieving your win condition, your abilities will be disabled and you will suicide this night. This passive is retained upon class change. > > **Incriminate (Night)** - Frame target player as a member of the Unseen or Cult. - Infinite Uses > **Disguise (Night)** - Target player will appear as the chosen class if they are executed tomorrow. - 2 Uses > > *Survive to see 2 marked players executed.*
[/details]
[details="Kings"]
># [color=steblue]The Good King :shield: :fire:[/color] > >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to occupation and redirection. >- Your abilities will not be seen by investigative abilities. >- You can use both day abilities in the same day. >- In instances of a tied vote where the tie does not include no execution, the player you have voted will take priority for execution. > >**Counsel (Day)** - The target of tonight's Guard (if any) will be conversion immune for the night and the following one. - 1 use **Allies (Day)** - Choose up to two players. During this night, you will have a private chat with them. - 2 Uses > >**Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a player. Bypasses death immunity. - 1 use (First King Only.) *Defeat the Unseen or Cult.*
> Crowned from members of the [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color].
># [color=purple]The Evil King :shield: :fire:[/color] > >[color=purple]**Unseen Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. If you were crowned from the Baron, this passive is disabled and there will be no more kings following your death. **Head of State (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to occupation and redirection. >- Your abilities will not be seen by investigative abilities. >- You can use both day abilities in the same day. >- In instances of a tied vote where the tie does not include no execution, the player you have voted will take priority for execution. >- If you die, you will only flip as your current class. >- Unless you were crowned from The Assassin, you will be unable to perform the factional kill unless there are 2 or less members of the Unseen alive. > >**Veto (Day)** - If the target of tonight's Guard is attacked by a player other than you, the kill will be guaranteed to succeed. - 1 use **Allies (Day)** - Choose up to two players. During this night, you will have a private chat with them. - 2 Uses > >**Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a player. Bypasses death immunity. - 1 use (First King Only.) *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> Crowned from members of the [color=purple]**Unseen**[/color].
># [color=darkred]The Devout King :shield: :fire:[/color] > >[color=darkred]**Cult Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to occupation and redirection. >- Your abilities will not be seen by investigative abilities. >- You can use both day abilities in the same day. >- In instances of a tied vote where the tie does not include no execution, the player you have voted will take priority for execution. >- If you die, you will only flip as your current class. > >**Dark God's Power (Day)** - All abilities other than the factional kill will be occupied today and tonight, bypassing immunities. - 1 use **Allies (Day)** - Choose up to two players. During this night, you will have a private chat with them. - 2 Uses > >**Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a player. Bypasses death immunity. - 1 use (First King Only.) *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> Crowned from members of the [color=darkred]**Cult**[/color].
All relevant neutrals will keep one night ability that they need in order to function properly. Merc will keep their guard, Inq will keep their stab, Scorned will keep their frame, and Strigoi will have their bite
> # [color=gray]The Decadent King :shield: :fire:[/color] > [color=gray]**Neutral Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to occupation and redirection. >- Your abilities will not be seen by investigative abilities. >- You can use both day abilities in the same day. >- In instances of a tied vote where the tie does not include no execution, the player you have voted will take priority for execution. >- Your wincon will denote what your previous win condition was before you were crowned. > > **Defenestration (Day)** - You will be able to perform night abilities twice tonight. - 1 Use > **Allies (Day)** - Choose up to two players. During this night, you will have a private chat with them. - 2 Uses > >**Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a player. Bypasses death immunity. - 1 use (First King Only.) **Personal Agenda (Night)** - Depending on what neutral you were crowned from, this ability will work like one of the following. > - **Ruthless Efficiency** if Inquisitor > - **Stand Guard** if Mercenary > - **Vampiric Bite** if Strigoi > - **Incriminate** if Scorned > > *Accomplish your win condition.*
> Crowned from any non-NE [color=gray]**Neutral**[/color].
># [color=turquoise]The Tyrannical King :shield: :fire:[/color] > >[color=turquoise]**Neutral Evil**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - You have access to the following effects: > - Immune to occupation and redirection. >- Your abilities will not be seen by investigative abilities. >- You can use both day abilities in the same day. >- In instances of a tied vote where the tie does not include no execution, the player you have voted will take priority for execution. > - If all members of the Unseen or Cult die, your win condition will change to *Defeat the Blue Dragon at any cost* , you will be able to perform a factional kill and the game won’t end as long as you are alive. > >**Insidious Mind (Day)** - The target of Guard tonight will have the following effects done unto them. They will be occupied. They will be unable to be protected from any attacks tonight. You will learn their class. If they are a member of the Unseen or Cult, you will be added to their chat. The player(s) they intended to visit (if any) will be framed. - 2 Uses **Allies (Day)** - Choose up to two players. During this night, you will have a private chat with them. - 2 Uses > >**Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a player. Bypasses death immunity. - 1 use (First King Only.) *Defeat the Blue Dragon.*
> Crowned from any Neutral Evil. [/details]
[details="Conversions"] **[color=steblue]The Archer[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Arbalist[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Butler[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Servant[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Invoker[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Chronomancer[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Timesnatcher[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Ritualist[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Paladin[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Templar[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Seeker[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Arcanist[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Ritualist[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Drunk[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Invoker[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Hunter[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Poacher[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Major[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The General[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Observer[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Seeker[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Herbalist[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Ritualist[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Princess[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Duchess[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Seeker[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Noble[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Apostle[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Mystic[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Illusionist[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Ritualist[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Squire[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Page[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Ritualist[/color]**. **[color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** converts into **[color=purple]The Enforcer[/color]** or **[color=darkred]The Invoker[/color]**. [/details]
[color=purple]**Mastermind**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] / [color=purple]**Baron**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Random Cult**[/color] [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] [color=steblue]**Major**[/color] / [color=steblue]**Archer**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color]**/**[color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=turquoise]**Neutral Evil**[/color]
## Playerlist
1. ~~EliThePsycho~~ - **Killed N3** - [color=steblue]**The Hunter**[/color] 2. ~~Min~~ - **Killed N4** - [color=steblue]**The Drunk**[/color] 3. ~~Marluxion~~ - **Executed D2** - [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] 4. ~~Geyde~~ ~~Zone_Q11~~ - **Executed D4** - [color=turquoise]**The Tyrannical King**[/color] 5. ~~Wazza~~ - **Killed N4** - [color=red]**The Scorned**[/color] 6. ~~Vulgard~~ an_gorta_pratai - **Survived** - [color=steblue]**The Mystic**[/color] 7. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ - **Killed N2** - [color=steblue]**The Squire**[/color] 8. ~~Jane~~ - **Killed N4** - [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] 9. SirDerpsAlot - **Survived** - [color=firebrick]**The Strigoi**[/color] 10. ~~WindwardAway~~ - **Killed N2** - [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] 11. ~~Amelia~~ ATNoName - **Survived** - [color=steblue]**The Knight**[/color] 12. ~~Nightingale~~ - **Killed N2** - [color=steblue]**The Court Wizard**[/color] 13. eevee :crown: - **Survived** - [color=steblue]**The Good King**[/color] 14. CRichard564 - **Survived** - [color=steblue]**The Court Wizard**[/color] 15. ~~Soulshade55r~~ - **Executed D3** - [color=steblue]**The Butler**[/color] 16. ~~Shurian~~ - **Killed N4** - [color=brown]**The Sellsword**[/color]
## Backups 1. Whysper 5. GGhana 7. Cheeki
## Spectators 1. KyoDaz (Informed) 2. Pigeon (Informed) 3. Conduit (Informed) 4. Intensify (Informed) 5. Trochilidae (Informed)

i think your handling of your class on D2 was a tiny bit awkward

mostly in the sense that i feel like you made it exceedingly obvious that you were a drunk who swapped geyde n1, and when you pushed windward and they outted they were redirected off of geyde n1, letting them know who they had actually checked might have been good?

although i probably only think this because they ended up shooting their greencheck and you had no real reason to think they were prince over any other invest

come to think of it this isnt really a criticism at all

but i typed it so i send it

item.title: EFoL 4&3/4 - Game Thread - Day 5 (5/16) - The Blue Dragon and Scorned are victorious!
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Team Player Award Thread Discussion
